title: Software Engineer Team Lead
body: why vacasawe started with just one home and an idea: to bring homeowners and renters together with smart technology and caring local teams. today, we‚Äôre the largest full-service vacation rental company in the us thanks to the people who give us their best every day. you‚Äôll fit right in here if you‚Äôre curious, collaborative, innovative, and thrive in a rapid-growth environment.do you want to be part of a team helping the largest vacation property management company in the us solve problems on a global scale? are you excited to explore the benefits of scalability and performance by leveraging modern, cloud-based technologies? at vacasa, we are constantly experimenting and fine-tuning our products. we value stability, security, and scalability. job functions as an engineering team lead, you will be accountable for the team‚Äôs output and growth. at vacasa, team leads manage engineers and are hands-on contributors, with varying percentage based on team‚Äôs needs. here‚Äôs some of what you will do with your team: help design and architect applications and services to support the business review your team‚Äôs work and provide recommendations via code reviews and discussion explore new technologies and validate concepts to help your team choose the right tool for the job utilize predominantly scrum methodology and ensure the team conducts the appropriate ceremonies drive accountability and quality of team deliverables ensure appropriate monitoring and instrumentation is implemented for production systems advocate for quality standards and work with your team to create robust testing capabilities what you‚Äôll do as a leader work with your team to deliver robust products manage a team of software engineers and quality assurance engineers be an effective bridge between product and the rest of your team manage change and contingencies for your team with a product manager participate in and encourage collaborative conversations around problem-solving provide a productive outlook and ensure all voices are heard to shape your team‚Äôs culture provide guidance and mentorship to other software engineers on your team handle disputes and debates fairly and provide timely and direct feedback to all team members foster a tech culture where you lead by example qualifications and requirements extensive experience working on software projects with a cross-functional team english advance (lead meetings with u.s. teams) adept at facilitating technical discussions that lead to informed decisions proficient at two or more programming languages experience writing infrastructure as code strong working knowledge of databases (sql & nosql) experience or enthusiasm to mentor engineers demonstrable experience delivering software products used in real-world environments desirable skills completed a b.s./m.s. in computer science (or equivalent work experience) experience working with cloud computing platforms, specifically aws experience in the hospitality or travel industry experience building serverless systems conditions open to remote work (within chile) extended health benefits! above legal vacations and time-off benefits. great saving plan benefits (apv) career plan annual bonus courses and certifications all of the equipment you‚Äôll need to be successful great team environment! pet-friendly pets are welcome at the premises. life insurance vacasa pays or copays life insurance for employees. bicycle parking you can park your bicycle for free inside the premises. health coverage vacasa pays or copays health insurance for employees. computer repairs vacasa covers some computer repair expenses. dental insurance vacasa pays or copays dental insurance for employees. computer provided vacasa provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. vacation over legal vacasa gives you paid vacations over the legal minimum. beverages and snacks vacasa offers beverages and snacks for free consumption. remote work policy locally remote only position is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in chile.

title: Front-end Engineer for USA Project
body: clickit: devops and software development is an agency who has developed cloud based solutions for almost 10 years, for customers from all around the world. our core competencies are financial services, healthcare, martech, ecommerce, big data & analytics and our experience comes with startups and mid-large enterprises. we are aws and gcp certified partners with the experience of helping more than 200 product and service-centric companies based out of the us with their cloud migration and devops initiatives. this position its to be part of our team. job functions we are looking for a front end engineer to join the team . we are on a mission to build vertical saas companies in areas as diverse as equipment rentals to healthcare to investment software. to do this, we need someone with a strong technical background to work directly with the cto and product owner in enabling this vision to come true.the developer tasks on this project will be adapting the frameworks already made for the application, as well as working with the back end engineer to adapt the functions planned for it.the engineer will also contribute with optimization of the code using mainly react and material ui. qualifications and requirements 2+ years of professional experience in the software industryexpertise with react.js or similar javascript frameworkexperience with material uiexperience consuming rest api and building elegant ui with at least some complex functionalitystrong experience with css and preferably with bootstrap or tailwind cssstrong communication skills in english desirable skills docker and docker compose, aws, ec2 and rds conditions fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

body: webdox es un software que resuelve los desaf√≠os asociados al manejo eficiente de los contratos en grandes empresas. presente en 7 pa√≠ses de latinoam√©rica, webdox brinda soluciones tecnol√≥gicas para la solicitud, redacci√≥n, colaboraci√≥n, negociaci√≥n, firma y seguimiento de los contratos de sus clientes corporativos y multinacionales, muchos de ellos empresas global fortune 500.estamos buscando a un product designer que se enfoque en la experiencia en los flujos de valor de webdox para las personas que conf√≠an en nosotros. estamos creciendo y entendiendo cada d√≠a m√°s a nuestros clientes, lo que significa que el desaf√≠o de mejorar y entregar un producto de calidad es nuestra prioridad.no buscamos encasillar las virtudes o aptitudes referentes a un rol espec√≠fico, por lo contrario, queremos que tu participaci√≥n colabore con el equipo de producto en cada parte del proceso de dise√±o. el pensamiento distribuido es nuestra forma de encontrar los problemas y solucionarlos. funciones del cargo desarrollar aplicaciones complejas y que entienda profundamente las diferentes arquitecturas y patrones para construir apps. asegurar que el c√≥digo sea de buena calidad siguiendo est√°ndares de clase mundial. impulsar desde su experiencia, mejoras tecnol√≥gicas. participar de forma transversal en el centro en el soporte al usuario para resoluci√≥n de problemas, mejoras y optimizaciones a los flujos relacionados a la usabilidad. an√°lisis y definici√≥n de requerimientos para miembros del equipo con perfil junior. requerimientos del cargo webdox es una soluci√≥n dirigida a empresas y oficinas de abogados que agiliza la b√∫squeda, creaci√≥n y administraci√≥n de todo tipo de documentos legales.webdox est√° buscando un nuevo integrante ¬°backend! para nuestros desaf√≠os de desarrollo web. lo que estamos construyendo es de un gran nivel y plantea muchos desaf√≠os interesantes para cualquier desarrollador. si cumples con el siguiente perfil: ruby on rails: debes dominar a la perfecci√≥n ruby y su framework (rails). (necesario para postular) javascript: no s√≥lo debes saber lo m√≠nimo para validar formularios, sino que debes manejar las particularidades del lenguajes conoces al menos un framework del lado del navegador como angular y/o react.js. entiendes http mucho m√°s all√° de "oye, 'llama' a esta url". sabes de m√©todos, cabeceras y la filosof√≠a rest. finalmente, tienes una buena base en css/html que te permite interactuar de buena manera con los dise√±adores y no resuelves cada problema a punta de "!important" ;) autonom√≠a. te sientes plenamente capaz desarrollar y sacar adelante una tarea. y por cierto ¬øeres autodisciplinado?, trabajas sin necesidad de presiones externas y gestionas tu tiempo con eficiencia. preocupaci√≥n por la ux (experiencia de usuario). no tienes que ser experto dise√±ando experiencias, pero debes preocuparte por tu usuario y saber apoyarte en los equipos de ux cuando es necesario. y por sobre todo no confundir "dise√±o" con ‚Äúmaquillaje". pragmatismo. aunque tengas un coraz√≥n perfeccionista, sabes tambi√©n que el mundo est√° lleno de "trade-offs" y puedes balancearlos para llegar a buenos resultados. ¬°ojo, que eso no significa programar al lote! por el contrario, sabes que a veces hay que ir lento para poder terminar antes. te comunicas bien. tienes excelente ortograf√≠a y redacci√≥n, tienes facilidad para ense√±ar y para explicar en simple lo que podr√≠a parecer complicado. beneficios en webdox nos preocupamos mucho de la felicidad del equipo. si trabajas aqu√≠, esto es parte de lo que te ofrecemos: el d√≠a libre en tu cumplea√±os desafios. nunca te aburrir√°s. un equipo de mujeres y hombres talentosos, con muy buen humor, mucho respeto y disposici√≥n. oficina incre√≠blemente bien ubicada, en metro tobalaba. te ofrecemos un sueldo de mercado y variara seg√∫n tus capacidades. fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. pet-friendly pets are welcome at the premises. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. health coverage webdox pays or copays health insurance for employees. computer provided webdox provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. vacation over legal webdox gives you paid vacations over the legal minimum. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Front-end Software Engineer
body: initialized capital, an early-stage venture capital firm with over $1b under management, is looking for a full-time remote front end software engineer contractor. this role will report to the lead software engineer and will focus on the web and mobile web experience for the software that powers initialized‚Äôs investing, portfolio management, and marketing processes. they will work with a team of other remote engineers, ship front end features regularly, participate in technical discussions and planning, and inform technical decisions and best practice guidance. the team practices the agile scrum methodology, including daily standups, sprint planning, and team retrospectives. job functions as a member of the team, you‚Äôll be responsible for maintaining and building out our react component library, used in our various in-house applications. you will work closely with a small distributed team of full-stack developers focused on adding new features to our new and existing software, while maintaining and improving the quality along the way. qualifications and requirements 2+ years of front end development experience 1+ years of react.js 16.8+ experience conversational english proficiency proficiency in the following technologies: react.js 16.8+ ( hooks ) modern javascript ( es6 ) consuming rest apis css/html desirable skills typescript graphql redux and legacy react applications back end experience ( such as node.js, next.js, or ruby on rails ) conditions flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy locally remote only position is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in mexico.

title: Full-Stack Engineer (.NET / React)
body: do what you love and make an impact. become a plutorian!we are in the business of helping companies become software juggernauts. over the last 9 years we have built an enterprise saas platform used by many of the world‚Äôs largest companies (vodafone, telefonica, westpac, pepsico, barclays‚Ä¶ just to name a few)we are a fully remote organisation with people working all over the world. we are are looking for an experienced full stack engineer to join our team to help build the future of plutora. we are in the middle of a major modernisation initiative where we are rolling out .net 6 and an improved ui using react, it's a great time to join plutora and not only work on some of the latest tech but also be part of a growing company! about the role you will be part of a cross-functional team that‚Äôs responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment. as a full stack engineer, you will influence and support your team to champion and deliver high quality, secure and scalable software. we are a fully cloud-based platform and we are in the middle of a major modernisation initiative moving to .net 6 - so you‚Äôll be working on the latest and greatest to build the future of plutorayour key responsibilities will include: design, develop, test and deploy high-quality, secure, scalable software work with team leads, developers, product managers, qa, and devops to develop solutions that drive our business goals, make work easier for our customers and deliver good performance, scalability, and reliability. participate in and help drive the best possible ways of working for software development including continuous improvement, ci/cd and test automation. ensure code quality and maintainability by tackling tech debt, conducting code reviews, initiate refactoring and improve build and test systems what you‚Äôll bring we are looking for passionate, enthusiastic and proactive people that want to build their future with us.we are looking for someone who is motivated by the prospect of delivering valuable, high quality updates to a feature-rich product. you will be designing and building features for our web and mobile applications and will need to understand considerations such as design for performance, usability and security.you will be joining a highly skilled team that consists of excellent mentors with a great culture of supporting each other that will assist to increase your skill set rapidly. agile processes are used to ensure that work is effective and efficient.experience and skill we are looking for you have deep knowledge and experience in application development with .net c# - ideally .net core experience with angular or react for front end development you have experience with modern javascript frameworks you understand the design, implementation and operation of distributed microservices and apis understanding of api security best practices experience in entity framework, ef core, sql server/postgresql you have experience with ci/cd pipeline tools (git, terraform, cypress, teamcity, octopus deploy) technically proficient in aws services (ec2, ecs, rds, lambda, s3 etc) experience working on a saas platform would be extremely beneficial good communication skills and ability to work with key stakeholders to produce a desired outcome. you are proficient in english, both spoken and written. you are comfortable discussing technical topics in english and explaining yourself through written form (slack / confluence) conditions most of our product engineering team are based in australia, so this role will require a slight adjustment of working hours to ensure maximum work day coverage between sydney and south america. fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. computer provided plutora provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

requerimientos del cargo tener experiencia con django, reactjs, javascript y python, es muy importante, ya que nuestra tecnolog√≠a est√° basada en estos frameworks, aplicaciones y lenguajes.en graviti valoramos a las personas autosuficientes, proactivas y con iniciativa cumpliendo los plazos de entrega de actividades sin necesidad de presi√≥n o monitoreos externos, creemos que la confianza en el equipo es s√∫per importante para lograr los objetivos establecidos. conditions pet-friendly pets are welcome at the premises. computer provided graviti provides a computer for your work. vacation over legal graviti gives you paid vacations over the legal minimum. vacation on birthday your birthday counts as an extra day of vacation. remote work policy locally remote only position is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in latam, de preferencia m√©xico.

title: BI Engineer
body: cornershop by uber is an app that gives you back some of your free time by allowing you to order from local grocery and specialty stores directly to your door. we are a fast-growing company operating in chile, brazil, peru, colombia, mexico, costa rica, the united states and canada, and, since our acquisition by uber, our growth continues to skyrocket, along with our team. so, if you want to work in an innovative environment with a startup culture, people who live for dad jokes, and good humor, you‚Äôre in the right place! how many people are needed to create an application that simplifies the purchase of food from users? at least 600, because that‚Äôs the number of people who are part of our team of engineers, who work in different countries in south and north america. the engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, buyers and stores, and to solving the challenges that arise along the way.cornershop has thousands of scale challenges so you can apply creativity, skill and experience to participate in the creation of optimization tools for different internal processes and propose improvements.our engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, shoppers and stores, and solving challenges along the way. we are looking for our next bi engineer, to take part in creating reports, as well as processing and analyzing data for the company.what will you do:- maintain a line of communication with our internal customers to understand their information needs and propose solutions.- develop dashboards that facilitate decision making in different areas of the company.- define new kpis to analyze and monitor operational aspects for improvement proposals. what do you need to succeed in this role? advanced sql skills. ideally, you have experience working with postgres or amazon redshift. advanced knowledge of visualization tools, preferably tableau. the ability to communicate in english, both written and conversational. we would love you even more if you... have experience interacting with the backend (understand how data is defined). are familiar with git. have worked with google analytics. are not afraid to make decisions and lead projects. work proactively, responsibly, and creatively. embrace diversity, multiculturality and are open-minded. like to learn constantly; not only about your job, but you have hobbies, you like to do things outside of work and you bring positive energy to the team. some of the benefits of working with us - additional vacation time- cornershop pop subscription- health, dental, and life insurance- tech platform to enhance your knowledge (o'reilly)- free language lessons- online fitness programs- moving day (two days per year)- marriage or civil union benefits (days off)- paternity/maternity benefits - partnerships with banks- partnership with caja los andes- wellness programsat cornershop, we focus on promoting an inclusive and accessible work environment, where all people feel valued, respected, and supported. we continue to build a workforce that reflects the diversity of our customers and communities where we live and serve. if you need accommodations to complete the application process, please let our team know directly. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. health coverage cornershop inc. pays or copays health insurance for employees. computer provided cornershop inc. provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. vacation over legal cornershop inc. gives you paid vacations over the legal minimum. remote work policy locally remote only position is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in remoto, chile.

title: Back-end Engineer (Python)
body: cornershop by uber is an on-demand grocery app that gives you free time, while your groceries and errands are delivered right to your door. we're a fast growing company operating throughout latin america and north america, and since our acquisition by uber, we just keep getting bigger. relaunched under our new brand name, cornershop by uber, we‚Äôre looking to avoca-grow our team. so, if north america. the engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, buyers and stores, and to solving the challenges that arise along the way. what will you do? cornershop has thousands of scale challenges so you can apply creativity, skill and experience to participate in the creation of optimization tools for different internal processes and propose improvements.collaborate with the engineering team in the back-end development of our main products. the main programming languages you will use are python and django.let‚Äôs hope you have the ability to deliver scalable solutions throughout the lifecycle of product development. what will you need to succeed in this role? to be able to understand and discuss the business model be passionate about the world of software development and love writing and reading code motivate challenges and learn constantly self-taught work with good software engineering practices such as clean code, testing, ci/cd, etc experience developing with python and django experience with postgres (or similar databases) specialize and solve complex backend-related software problems communicate with others in spanish and english, especially written we would love you even more if you... you‚Äôre not afraid to make decisions and lead projects work proactively, responsibly, and creatively embrace diversity, interculturality and be tolerant you like to constantly learn not only about your work: have a hobby, like doing things and be a positive contribution to the team some of the benefits of working with us - additional vacation time- cornershop pop subscription- health, dental, and life insurance- tech platform to enhance your knowledge (o'reilly)- free language lessons- online fitness programs- moving day (two days per year)- marriage or civil union benefits (days off)- paternity/maternity benefits - partnerships with banks- partnership with caja los andes- wellness programsen cornershop, body: üö¢‚úàÔ∏è klog.co is the platform that moves and digitizes your cargo.we believe there is no reason for logistics to be complex, so we simplify it. we move, control and improve your supply chain through our comprehensive platform.in order to make this a reality, our team focuses heavily on ui & ux providing an intuitive and centralized experience.currently we are facing a whole set of frontend and backend heavy features, a complete rebranding and revamp of our platform.regarding our team, we take pride on our cultural mix of seasoned logistics experts and tech savvy engineers.we strongly believe that developers are not ticket tackers, but play a key role of our platform's success, taking ownership over whole projects, understanding the underlying business and making sensible decisions. ü§ñ the job this position is about programming, mentoring and helping us solidify our architecture.you will work inside the engineering team but will have contact with all departments.among other things we expect you to: analyze, identify, implement possible improvements. develop our external api. modularize and create efficient abstractions for our backend. üôã‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è who are we looking for? we are looking for a very experienced but humble team player. the position is open to developers with +4-6 years of experience.verifiable technical skills: js: very well versed on js and very comfortable with es6 react node sql graphql advanced english ü§û optional skills knowing these will make a big difference: tdd prisma + nexus aws serverless framework apollo functional programming üíï pros an amazing full floor office (you wouldn't believe the view!) amazing team! medical and oncological insurance (falp), dental coverage, etc. affiliation to compensation fund k-bank "0% interest loans" for our team k-university, continuous education programe free days on important dates personal training fresh fruit every day arcade, fussball and resting area. wellness program klog.co offers or subsidies mental and/or physical health activities. fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. internal talks klog.co offers space for internal talks or presentations during working hours. life insurance klog.co pays or copays life insurance for employees. digital library access to digital books or subscriptions. health coverage klog.co pays or copays health insurance for employees. company retreats team-building activities outside the premises. computer repairs klog.co covers some computer repair expenses. dental insurance klog.co pays or copays dental insurance for employees. computer provided klog.co provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. recreational areas space for games or sports. beverages and snacks klog.co offers beverages and snacks for free consumption. time for side projects klog.co allows employees to work in side-projects during work hours. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Back-end Developer
body: reign is an approachable, smart and international team of people who love developing apps and web solutions. we have comfortable offices in santiago, near the biggest green area in the city.reign was founded by designers and developers so we created a work environment to suit you: plenty of quiet spaces to work, free coffee and access to the latest devices to tinker with. our processes are agile, avoiding unnecessary meetings. we run regular tutorials on interesting programming, managing and design topics.since 2015 we‚Äôve been helping our clients around the world. we believe our diverse, focused, talented team makes us highly effective and helps us bring a fresh and open attitude to everything we do. what you need: we are looking for an experienced back-end developer to join our team! as a back-end developer, you will be responsible for the server-side web application logic, modeling data structures, choosing the right databases for the project requirements, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. you will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your coworkers into the application. a basic understanding of front-end technologies is therefore necessary as well.if you have outstanding programming skills and a great passion for developing high-scalable and innovative applications, then you will love this job. if you‚Äôre also familiar with agile methodologies, we‚Äôd like to meet you.responsibilities developing and maintaining all server-side components ensuring optimal performance and responsiveness to front-end requests collaborating with front-end developers on the integration of elements designing customer-facing back-end services for various business processes developing high-performance applications by writing testable, reusable, and efficient code implementing effective security protocols, data protection measures, and storage solutions running diagnostic tests, bug fixes, and providing technical support documenting processes, including database schemas, as well as preparing reports recommending and implementing improvements to processes and technologies collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of designers, developers, project managers, and devops. requirements proven work experience as a backend-end developer extensive knowledge of javascript, typescript, web stacks, libraries, and frameworks like nodejs, express, and nestjs experience consuming and building robust, restful, and graphql apis experience with relational and nosql databases like postgresql, mongodb, redis solid understanding of concepts like microservices architecture, serverless architecture, docker, kubernetes be familiar with the concept of pipelines for continuous delivery and continuous integration and have used at least one platform like circleci, gitlab ci, github actions, travis ci, or heroku pipelines git, github, git flow, and experience with code review having been part of a multidisciplinary team and have used agile methodologies like kanban / scrum. it would be cool if you had experience in: kubernetes headless ecommerce cloud architecture payment gateways ssdlc airflow send us your application and: once we've received and reviewed your cv, we'll email to let you know how well we feel you'd fit into the role. if you make it to the next round, we'll send you a test to complete. make sure you give it your all!if your test goes well (we'll have several people reviewing it, so do your best) we'll be in touch about an interview. if there's anything important that you need to know before the interview, let us know and we'll do our best to help. accessible an infrastructure adequate for people with special mobility needs. fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. internal talks reign offers space for internal talks or presentations during working hours. bicycle parking you can park your bicycle for free inside the premises. computer provided reign provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. vacation over legal reign gives you paid vacations over the legal minimum. beverages and snacks reign offers beverages and snacks for free consumption. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Full-Stack Developer
body: fancy a challenge?if you've got a few years' experience working as a full stack developer, reign would make a great choice for your next step.we're a company that loves new tech, where you'll get the opportunity to focus on learning and writing great code that underpins and supports your team's technical decisions. with agile methodologies and processes at our core, you won't be stuck in loads of useless meetings every day; you'll be working flexible hours to fit in with your own needs, in an environment where you can make your voice heard. our clients are large national and international companies like coca-cola embonor, smu unimarc, millicom international, and we're looking to welcome a new member into our top-notch team! who's our ideal new recruit? we're looking for an experienced back and front end coder with 3-5 years' experience.our ideal teammate would be someone comfortable working with development frameworks and library management, who can produce and scale software solutions alongside a multifunctional team. they'll be working across the software development lifecycle, from design to implementation. so, if you're able to work independently and responsibly, writing clean, solid code, then this could be your perfect job.as a full stack developer, you'll be working with dev teams and product managers to bring software solutions to life, constantly innovating to build and improve products.responsibilities design client and server-side architecture build great-looking app frontends write effective apis test software for efficiency and responsiveness review, refactor and update software design in and implement security and data protection methodologies build apps and features with responsive mobile design author technical documentation work with data scientists and data analysts to improve software requirements as a full stack developer, we're not just looking for someone who works methodically but also who can approach and solve problems cleanly. we want you to be able to put your knowledge and best practice to work! strong working knowledge in server-side development using node.js experience in front-end development using frameworks like react or angular strong knowledge of javascript and typescript experience in web development; your html and css knowledge should be on point familiarity with cloud architecture on aws, google cloud, serverless architecture and cdns familiarity with docker and docker compose familiarity with the concept of continuous delivery and continuous integration pipelines. experience using testing frameworks (unit testing, e2e testing, etc.) rest api and writing api specs and documentation you'll definitely have worked in a multidisciplinary team that uses agile methodologies like kanban/scrum experience and familiarity with different types of databases (key-value, document store, object store, relational databases, etc.) it would be great if you have experience in: jamstack architecture headless ecommerce contentful algolia kubernetes graphql netlify atomic design methodology ant design devops elastic stack send us your application and: once we've received and reviewed your cv, we'll email to let you know how well we feel you'd fit into the role. if you make it to the next round, we'll send you a test to complete. make sure you give it your all!if your test goes well (we'll have several people reviewing it, so do your best) we'll be in touch about an interview. if there's anything important that you need to know before the interview, let us know and we'll do our best to help. accessible an infrastructure adequate for people with special mobility needs. fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. internal talks reign offers space for internal talks or presentations during working hours. bicycle parking you can park your bicycle for free inside the premises. computer provided reign provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. vacation over legal reign gives you paid vacations over the legal minimum. beverages and snacks reign offers beverages and snacks for free consumption. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Python Back-end Developer
body: en symlab buscamos incorporar a nuestro equipo a un/una desarrollador/a para que nos ayude con los proyectos de nuestros clientes!somos una compa√±√≠a de desarrollo de tecnolog√≠a y soluciones, nos basamos en apoyar la transformacion digital de nuestros clientes a trav√©s del desarrollo de apps webs y m√≥viles, integraciones entre plataformas y automatizaci√≥n de flujos de operaci√≥n, adem√°s de implementar soluciones innovadoras a nivel tecnologico para abrir nuevos mercaos.nos enfocamos en estar actualizados con el estado de la tecnolog√≠a y brindar este conocimiento al trabajo que hacemos, por lo que estamos constantemente actualiz√°ndonos con el estado del arte.nuestro stack principal actualmente es de generar infraestructura como c√≥digo a trav√©s de arquitecturas serverless en aws y gcp utilizando python, node.js y react, junto con utilizar flutter para el desarrollo multiplataforma de apps. job functions buscamos a un/a desarrollador/a backend para que se incorpore a nuestro equipo, quien estar√° trabajando en proyectos para nuestros clientes, pero reportando directamente a nosotros.las funciones corresponden a desarrollar aplicaciones y sistemas como parte de nuestro equipo, implementando endpoints y flujos en el backend del sistema de manera escalable y atomizada utilizando el framework del proyecto¬øqu√© esperamos de ti? que seas una persona que aporte al equipo y que te gusten los desaf√≠os. que seas capaz de proponer soluciones, no queremos alguien que s√≥lo tome pedidos. excelentes habilidades de comunicaci√≥n, al ser un equipo 100% remoto sabemos que la comunicaci√≥n es clave y que no siempre es f√°cil, m√°s cuando es as√≠ncrona. necesitamos personas que sepan escuchar, y transmitir sus ideas de forma clara. no nos gustan las reuniones de 2 horas por meet, pero somos muy activos por slack. que seas capaz de proponer mejoras a lo que ya est√° establecido, que te gusten las buenas pr√°cticas y que si hay algo que mejorar lo podamos ver y aplicar. ¬øqu√© puedes esperar de nosotros? flexibilidad, realmente evaluamos por objetivos cumplidos, si tienes que ir a comprar algo a mitad del d√≠a, atender a tus hijos o mascota,tomarte un break, no hay problema, lo que nos importa es que los objetivos comprometidos y acordados se cumplan dentro de lo posible. tambi√©n si vives en otra regi√≥n, otro pa√≠s, te piensas mudar, nos da igual, somos 100% remotos. tratamos mantener las interrupciones al m√≠nimo. a todos nos ha pasado, el sprint m√°s dif√≠cil y 5 reuniones de 2 horas y esperan que hagas todo el trabajo igual? sabemos que es un problema en la industria y nos encargamos de filtrarlo no hacemos pruebas de pizarr√≥n! nuestras pruebas suelen ser un peque√±o proyecto que no deben tomar m√°s de 4 horas de tu tiempo. todav√≠a buscamos en google cual es comando para sortear un array qualifications and requirements buscamos a un/a desarrollador/a full time que se maneje en las siguientes tecnolog√≠as o que tengas las siguientes competencias como base: python - que tengas experiencia creando o contribuyendo en gran parte a al menos una api o backend realizada en python experiencia en frameworks de python para backend (puede ser flask, django, fastapi, entre otros) - ideal que hayas evaluado cual utilizar para poder decidir cual usar seg√∫n las caracteristicas de un proyecto git y control de versiones conocimientos para desarrollar la parte backend de una aplicaci√≥n desde 0 entender como utilizar bases de datos, tanto relacionales como no relacionales desirable skills testing, sabes como crear tests unitarios, de integraci√≥n? title: Senior Back-end Engineer
body: turn is a 60-person, venture-backed, experienced team of entrepreneurs that are focused on driving unprecedented value in the contingent workforce industry. our workforce acquisition platform is used by companies in 30+ industry verticals ranging from ride-share to delivery to healthcare. we support employers that need to find, screen, and onboard last mile labor quickly ‚Äì that could be 500 delivery workers in miami or 2k+ nursing professionals across multiple cities every month. job functions the developer is responsible for designing, coding, and maintaining scalable products by participating in all phases of the development process. this role would also involve mentoring other team members. as a software engineer at turn, you will be responsible for: designing, coding, and maintaining scalable products by participating in all phases of the development process. collaborating with the head of engineering on technical standards and practices. developing features iteratively using the agile scrum methodology. working together with product, design, and business to define the roadmap. guiding the integration of several third-party apis. adding and maintaining features in our backend systems, and back-office suite. working in small teams to design, prototype, and build our product offering and tools. creating robust automated unit/functional tests. additionally, it is expected of you to stay up to date on the latest technologies and advancements in the recruitment and on-demand field, refine your product and design skills, and increase your knowledge of the work transformation market. qualifications and requirements 4-5+ years‚Äô experience in: python (flask/django) relational databases (postgresql preferred) non-relational databases (elastic preferred) design of rest services asynchronous task queues git (github preferred) english (intermediate or advanced) ability to bring solutions to the table excellent communication skills proactive diligent desirable skills aws gcp heroku sqlalchemy docker benefits competitive salary healthcare plan paid time off 100% remote work excellent company culture and growth opportunities fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. vacation over legal turn technologies gives you paid vacations over the legal minimum. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: API Developer (Relocation to US)
body: sngular was founded in madrid, spain over 20 years ago as an information technology firm developing custom software solutions for some of the leading financial institutions in europe. today, we are a team of +800 in spain, mexico, chile, singapur and the us and provide a wide range of technology solutions to companies around the world in industries as diverse as health, energy and telecommunications. from custom software development to ai, from ecommerce to iot, we help companies harness and leverage today‚Äôs most cutting edge digital technologies to create value and grow. as we like to say, if a customer needs it, ‚Äúit can be done.‚Äù who we‚Äôre looking for we are seeking a senior api developer with hands-on experience in defining, developing and providing the operational support service such as monitoring, health and hygiene, and overall availability of the api product offering for critical components of api platform based on a microservices architecture.* this job is not eligible to be performed in the states of new york, california or colorado*this in an onsite opportunity and full time employee contract. in case, we help you with the relocation. what you‚Äôll be doing provides technical support to api development teams and other technical teams such as incident management, infrastructure teams to troubleshoot issues related to the api platform in different environments provide maintenance/break fix support for performance enhancement/code fix in case of production defects setup security models and policies for consumers and producers of api and catalog assets setup distributed as well as embedded api gateways with various load balancing topologies deploy api definitions & implementations, policies and certificates in different environments of ibm api connect and mule runtime environments upgrade the api infrastructure using the api connect and mulesoft in different environments setup api analytics for consumption through various channels including elk and kafka stack collaborate with other engineering teams to implement ci/cd processes to support secure, scalable, and maintainable releases in a highly regulated environment what you bring developing, testing and maintaining highly available, real time, distributed java microservices using springboot spock test framework jenkins pipeline rest and microservice architecture oauth security git / bitbucket understand implementation of cross-cutting logging, audit, security and json message validation for apis experience in modeling an api, its resources as well as its data model (in json format) and documenting the model using swagger cloud-native development and deployment technologies including kubernetes and openshift familiar with concurrency prepare technical and procedural documentation works with team member in areas such as gathering requirements, designing apis and supporting production deployment activities, etc. implementation of complex integration solutions experience with ci/cd pipeline knowledge of agile principles what we offer during your interview process, our team can fill you in on all the details of our industry-leading benefits and career development opportunities. a few highlights include: medical ppo & hdhp plans dental ppo plan vision plan flexible spending accounts health savings account life & accidental death & dismemberment short-term disability long-term disability critical illness group legal plan 401(k) paid time off and holidays what you should know: our success begins and ends with our people. we embrace diverse perspectives and value unique human experiences. we are proud to be an equal opportunity employer that celebrates the diversity of the communities where we live and do business. applicants for our positions are considered without regard to race, ethnicity, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, religion, military or veteran status, or any other characteristics protected by law. remote work policy locally remote only position is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in boston.

title: Back-end Developer
body: somos una empresa en crecimiento que hace 4 a√±os estaba integrada por 5 personas y hoy somos un equipo de m√°s de 100 personas enfocadas en superar las expectativas de nuestros clientes y brindar la mejor experiencia de entregas en el pa√≠s. ponemos el coraz√≥n en todo lo que hacemos, no nos conformamos s√≥lo con cumplir, nos esforzamos por sorprender y entregar resultados de excelencia. nos desafiamos constantemente e incentivamos la iniciativa y la participaci√≥n activa de todos, para que as√≠ puedan influir positivamente en los servicios, procesos y sistemas.valoramos tanto la calidad humana como profesional de las personas que integran el equipo. estamos siempre dispuestos a colaborar, somos positivos y nos relacionamos de manera cercana, horizontal y respetuosa. somos √°giles y flexibles. vemos los cambios como oportunidades, nos adaptamos r√°pidamente y vamos por m√°s. ¬øcu√°les son las funciones de un backend developer en alas? como backend developer te encargar√°s de la mejora continua de la plataforma propia, con foco en la optimizaci√≥n de funcionalidades seg√∫n las necesidades del negocio. de esta manera, realizar√°s revisiones, pruebas y an√°lisis de los desarrollos de manera de asegurar altos est√°ndares de calidad, te ocupar√°s de la integraci√≥n con clientes (empresas a quienes prestamos servicio de entregas) y proveedores (apis, ws, etc), y desarrollar√°s soluciones back-end para la automatizaci√≥n y eficiencia de las tareas de la operaci√≥n. ¬øcu√°les son los requisitos para postular? estamos buscando un profesional con muchas ganas de poner en pr√°ctica sus conocimientos, por lo que alas te entregar√° un espacio para desarrollar tus habilidades y llevar a la pr√°ctica todo lo que has aprendido.para desempe√±ar el cargo debes contar con algunos conocimientos, como manejo en ambiente de desarrollo back-end, utilizando python con django; dominio de git, docker o similares; conocimiento en servicios cloud como gcp o aws, as√≠ como en angular/javascript; y alguna experiencia desarrollando tests y documentaci√≥n. y mejor a√∫n si... cuentas con conocimiento en desarrollo m√≥vil con xamari. aunque esto no es un requisito excluyente. ¬øqu√© condiciones te ofrecemos? te ofrecemos trabajar en una modalidad mixta en forma permanente (no s√≥lo por la pandemia), que considera s√≥lo 2 d√≠as a la semana en la oficina y 3 d√≠as desde donde tu quieras.tendr√°s la oportunidad de desempe√±arte en un ambiente de trabajo din√°mico y desafiante, y trabajar en un clima cordial y distendido.en alas nos concentramos en tu talento, no nos importa tu vestimenta, si te sientes c√≥modo(a) puedes venir con jeans, zapatillas, shorts o como quieras.si te enfermas, queremos que gastes menos en salud, por lo que te entregamos un seguro de salud complementario que cubre tanto atenciones m√©dicas y hospitalarias como dentales y medicamentos. life insurance alas pays or copays life insurance for employees. partially remote you can work from your home some days a week. health coverage alas pays or copays health insurance for employees. dental insurance alas pays or copays dental insurance for employees. free car parking you can park your car for free at the premises. commuting stipend alas offers a stipend to cover some commuting costs. computer provided alas provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy temporarily remote during covid-19 position is remote only during covid-19-related restrictions.

title: Front-end Engineer
body: haystack news is the leading local & world news service on connected tvs reaching millions of users! this is a unique opportunity to work at haystack news, one of the fastest-growing tv startups in the world. we are already preloaded on 37% of all tvs shipped in the us! be part of a silicon valley startup and work directly with the founding team. jumpstart your career by working with stanford & carnegie mellon alumni and faculty who have already been part of other successful startups in silicon valley.you should join us if you're hungry to learn how silicon valley startups thrive, you like to ship quickly and often, love to solve challenging problems, and like working in small teams.see haystack's feature at this year's google io: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-yawui6qpck we are passionate about creating amazing consumer experiences. we're a talented and experienced team that emphasizes giving everyone on the team a lot of ownership over what they are working on. we sweat every product detail. that includes making the backend and frontend extremely performant, picking and prioritizing the right videos for each user, and building a beautiful and easy-to-use interface.as a front-end engineer, you'll be responsible for developing our web app and html-based smart tv app on a variety of platforms (e.g. samsung, lg, sony, etc). job requirements (important: your job application has to be in english)minimum requirements: strong written and spoken english is a must! b.s. or m.s. degree in computer science or electrical engineering with 3+ years of related professional work experience strong software engineering skills with expertise in javascript, html, and css experience with dom manipulation. experience with common javascript frameworks such as react, vue, or angular. experience with node.js and express is a plus! ability to quickly learn new technologies strong communication skills (no agencies please) conditions relocation offered if you are moving in from another country, haystack news helps you with your relocation. fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. computer repairs haystack news covers some computer repair expenses. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Angular Front-end Lead
body: sngular was founded in madrid, spain over 20 years ago as an information technology firm developing custom software solutions for some of the leading financial institutions in europe. today, we are a team of +800 in spain, mexico, chile, singapur and the us and provide a wide range of technology solutions to companies around the world in industries as diverse as health, energy and telecommunications. from custom software development to ai, from ecommerce to iot, we help companies harness and leverage today‚Äôs most cutting edge digital technologies to create value and grow. as we like to say, if a customer needs it, ‚Äúit can be done.‚Äù funciones del cargo who we‚Äôre looking foras an angular frontend developer at sngular, you will specialize in building responsive and elegant web applications that scale to millions of users. as a part of a highly specialized team, you will play a pivotal role in developing new platforms and maintaining existing systems for some of the global institutions leading banking digital transformation.* you need to be based in us, we will help you with the relocation.* this job is not eligible to be performed in the states of new york, california or colorado.* this is a full time employee contract requerimientos del cargo what your responsibilities will be deliver expert level javascript, typescript, html and css code for modern browsers. analyze new technologies and existing systems to solve integration problems. interface with other engineers to plan and organize the development of our client‚Äôs products. develop solutions that account for scalability and optimize performance. construct excellent production-ready code in an agile environment. execute user research and requirements gathering for new and existing products. manage the release life cycle and feature roadmap of our client‚Äôs products. assure quality by doing thorough code reviews, and promoting top programming practices and standards. influence how and what we build with demonstrated technical expertise. opcionales what requirements we‚Äôre looking for bachelor of science degree in computer science, engineering, math or science discipline and 8+ years of experience delivering user-facing software products. at least 5+ years developing with js/es6/typescript seasoned knowledge of front end frameworks such as angular7+ prior experience integrating with backend apis significant understanding of user experience design principals and ability to contribute in design sessions. knowledge of progressive web applications (pwa) an agile mindset with experience working in an agile environment. understanding of cloud platforms (aws / azure / openshift / gcp) is a plus have experience in the financial services industry excellent leadership, communication and teamwork skills. proactive, self-motivated and adapted to changes condiciones what we‚Äôll bring:during your interview process, our team can fill you in on all the details of our industry-leading benefits and career development opportunities. a few highlights include: medical ppo & hdhp plans dental ppo plan vision plan flexible spending accounts health savings account life & accidental death & dismemberment short-term disability long-term disability critical illness group legal plan 401(k) 23 paid time off and holiday

title: Senior Software Engineer (Clojure)
body: with ever-growing workloads on the cloud, companies face significant challenges in managing productivity and spending, and maximizing impact to their businesses. compute software is addressing a huge market opportunity to help companies make good business decisions and run optimally on the public cloud. we're building a powerful platform to give customers the tools they need to gain transparency, optimize their usage, and execute change across their organizations.we're a small, distributed team, currently spanning california to quebec, and we offer early stage market-rate compensation (including equity), health and dental insurance, and 401k benefits. you'll be joining a venture capital-backed, distributed team with ambitious goals, and you will have the ability to make a direct and lasting impact on the team and product. job functions be one of the earliest employees and join our early-stage engineering team as a senior software engineer. you will be essential in shaping the features and functionality of our saas platform, culture and processes.you'll spend your day enveloped in clojure. the backend is written in clojure and driven by data in datomic and influxdb. the frontend is written in clojurescript using re-frame and communicates with the backend using pathom. we deploy to aws fargate and datomic ions.for product development, we follow shape up. we use notion, slack, and clubhouse.what will you do at compute software? write clojure and clojurescript. design, build, and deploy features and bug fixes across the entire stack. become an expert in all the nuances of the various cloud platforms like amazon web services, google cloud, and microsoft azure. provide product feedback and evaluate trade-offs to impact product direction. debug production problems. qualifications and requirements passion - you are excited about the large, high-growth cloud computing market and figuring out how to help customers, who are using cloud computing solutions today. you are excited by being one of the earliest employees and getting to work with a small team. engineering experience - you're a clojure practitioner with 6+ years of professional experience. you know what it takes to create large-scale b2b software. you can create effective and simple solutions to problems quickly, and communicate your ideas clearly to your teammates. product-minded - you love building products and you care about the details of creating a great user experience. you have an interest in how users will use our platform and the impact we will have on them. you can balance your consideration of the product and user requirements with technical complexity and implementation details to make appropriate decisions when things are unclear. effective communication - you're great at communicating. if something is unclear you reach out and ask questions. you're comfortable owning, communicating and presenting information on specific projects or initiatives, both in writing and in person. organizational and project management - you are highly organized and able to self-manage projects in a fast-moving company. you are able to take high level goals and break them down into achievable steps. desirable skills minimum of 3 years of professional clojure experience for saas applications. conditions equity offered this position includes equity compensation (in the form of stock options or another mechanism). health coverage compute software pays or copays health insurance for employees. retirement plan compute software pays or matches payment for plans such as 401(k) and others. dental insurance compute software pays or copays dental insurance for employees. remote work policy locally remote only position is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in usa, canada, mexico, south america.

title: Principal Data Engineer
body: zebrands was founded in 2015, with the introduction of its first brand luuna. luuna was developed with the purpose of revolutionizing the mexican sleep industry and has become the fastest-growing direct-to-consumer brand across all categories and a reference for disruptions in the retail industry in mexico. since then, we have launched multiple brands, transforming luuna into zebrands, a brand powerhouse.our customer-centric business model, powered by a strong it backbone has allowed us to double our sales every year, on average, since inception. zebrands intends to keep delivering high-quality products and services, powered by the best-in-class tech platform across mexico and latin america, targeting different industries with the same characteristics as the sleep industry in mexico.want to know more about us? watch this video!zebrands - el futuro del retail funciones del cargo this role is a key and long-term leadership position inside our advanced analytics center ofexcellence (coe), where you will have the responsibility of owning and evolving our datainfrastructure and empowering business area leads with insights from data analytics andvisualization. this is primarily a hands-on technical role requiring business acumen andleadership abilities, as you will manage a team of data engineers and scientists from a technicalstandpointwe are looking for someone passionate about technology and processes who wants to facenew challenges and is capable and excited to grow, manage and elevate a team of datatypical projects include: ‚Ä¢ expanding the functionality of our big data and advanced analytics platform‚Ä¢ creating new visualizations and self-service capabilities in dashboards for ourbusiness intelligence area, including breaking down requirements and overseeingwork package delivery from more junior data engineers‚Ä¢ integrating the capabilities of the entire etl cycle for data based on businessrequirements‚Ä¢ creating and modelling data lakes and data warehouses effectively‚Ä¢ adapting and implementing data technologies such as apache spark, apache airflow,amazon emr, aws glue, amazon redshift, amazon athena, among others‚Ä¢ implementing best practices throughout the development lifecycle, interacting with ci /cd pipelines and applying containerization and orchestration toolszebrands is at crossroads, significantly stepping up its investment and capabilities in the dataspace. accordingly, this is a perfect role for someone excited to take on real responsibilities,joining a young and growing team with space to lead its development and the constructionof a state-of-the art data chapter in a retail powerhousecommand of both spanish and english is required for this position requerimientos del cargo bachelor‚Äôs in computer science or similar technical degree‚Ä¢ experience working with sql‚Ä¢ strong understanding of database development‚Ä¢ data modeling‚Ä¢ good command of and experience working with python, go, scala and other languages‚Ä¢ working experience with core aws services (e.g., ec2 and s3)‚Ä¢ experience with data warehouses like bigquery or redshift‚Ä¢ experience in data streams processing technologies including kafka, spark, etc.‚Ä¢ experience working with nosql databases such as cassandra, hbase or bigtable‚Ä¢ experience working with cloud-hosted services, such as aws or gcp‚Ä¢ experience working with aws big data technologies (redshift, emr, glue)‚Ä¢ experience working with ci/cd pipelines‚Ä¢ experience working with amazon quicksight‚Ä¢ experience working with docker opcionales project management skills‚Ä¢ experience managing complex projects involving multiple parties and complexity layers‚Ä¢ ability to effectively organize your time and prioritize your tasks, working independently‚Ä¢ ability to handle tight deadlines and play as a reliable team contributor‚Ä¢ ability to work iteratively, building solutions though collaboration and inputsinterpersonal skills‚Ä¢ ability to lead a team, technically and professionally assess and guide collaborators‚Ä¢ ability to communicate your ideas in a structured manner, both in writing and verbally‚Ä¢ empathetic and able to click with different personality types to foster collaboration‚Ä¢ ability to read situations and adapt your personal style to different contexts and are aneffective influencer condiciones we offer‚Ä¢ competitive compensation reviewed annually based on performance‚Ä¢ result-based annual bonus of up to 110% of the monthly salary‚Ä¢ agile workplace with feedback-based culture and trainings‚Ä¢ legal benefits (25-day bonus and 25% vacation bonus)‚Ä¢ 15 days of vacation from the first year with annual increase‚Ä¢ major medical expense insurance (aaa policy) / premium hospitals‚Ä¢ life insurance‚Ä¢ medical membership (commercial, medical and laboratory discounts)‚Ä¢ gym support fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours title: Senior Software Engineer
body: this job is posted by krowdy on behalf of belcorp belcorp is a multinational leading beauty and personal care company. we develop talent by promoting the best people through innovative ways of working, creating opportunities to grow, and fostering a culture of high performance with solid leadership, focused on achieving extraordinary results.our tech team is constantly looking for and testing the latest trends in technology, developing solutions that generate company-wide changes and achieve results for global growth.learn more about our tech team here: https://afly.co/gq56we are looking for an experienced and skilled back-end software engineer to join our team. this is an excellent position for people who enjoy developing end-to-end enterprise software and creating world-class products for businesses. our ideal candidate is someone who is an enthusiast about new technologies, loves thinking about the full picture, and understands what effect their decisions will have on end-users. activities you will do design, own, deliver and execute software activities for belcorp‚Äôs core platforms and experiences. design and develop software using a modern technology stack. build and maintain services for high traffic and scale as well as design system architecture. work collaboratively with stakeholders across engineering projects to improve the quality of platform assets while reducing the time to market. work with product managers and other engineering team members for seamless integration with services and components. solve high complexity engineering problems, while enabling a high-performance user experience. collaborate with cloudops team on pipeline automation such as ci and cd. be an active member of the software engineer community of belcorp. what we need from you good english level (speaking). strong nodejs or java programming skills, data structures, and micro-services architecture and development. knowledge of sql database and nosql databases. proven experience in building restful apis and a deep understanding of rest principles and api integration. demonstrating experience with api testing including test automation, load and performance testing; knowledge and practice with cloud computing concepts and tools, with the ability to understand cloud-native architecture as aws (preference), google or azure communication skills and experience in collaborative environments. ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements. enterprise experience with oop, design patterns, and best practices. test-driven development, unit testing, and test integration (junit, mocha, others.) code review tools (sonar qube, linting, others). conditions & benefits the job is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in colombia or peru to apply. above-market pay. performance bonuses. flextime. days off in addition to vacations, to recover your energy. early friday - friday hours until noon. belcorp academy, linkedin learning. agreements with world-renowned universities. annual preventive medical check-ups for you and your dependents. belcorp2go (app for agreements and discount coupons). 35% discount on products of our brands. jubilee program, for those who retire with us. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. remote work policy locally remote only position is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in per√∫ o colombia.

title: Front-end Web Developer
body: tecla has been working with top u.s. technology and software companies since 2013. we work with modern stacks and on exciting projects and products filled with rewarding challenges.we are a fully remote and distributed company and we are lucky enough to have a diverse and multi-national team with team members in the u.s., mexico, chile, peru, colombia, argentina, brazil, costa rica, and venezuela. job functions we are looking for a full-time, front-end web developer with 1-2 years of experience creating custom websites using html, css, jquery, and a bit of javascript. responsibilities primarily include translating adobe xd designs into fully responsive landing pages and websites, as well as providing updates and edits to already-built websites.please only apply if you love front-end web development and desire to create beautiful code for websites using html, css, and a bit of jquery and js. qualifications and requirements excellent understanding of html, css, and scss, without using css frameworks such as bootstrap. the ability to use css flex and animations to create dynamic web layouts that are fully responsive and that work in a variety of web browsers (chrome, firefox, ie, edge, and safari). basic adobe photoshop and adobe xd skills. we have a design team that provides designs and images; however, you will occasionally need to use photoshop and xd to crop and resize photos. ability to work quickly, an excellent attention to detail, and a desire to learn are absolutely required. *please upload your cv in english. conditions fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

body: somos una startup latinoamericana (miami, santiago, bogot√° y lima, pr√≥ximamente en buenos aires, montevideo, ciudad de m√©xico), formada por ex ejecutivos de google y cisco, dedicada a traer a plataforma openstack (desarrollada por la nasa, y que se usa en datacenters de todo el mundo).como buena startup, somos relajados en el estilo de trabajo, pero muy comprometidos con alcanzar nuestros objetivos con alto nivel de excelencia. queremos ser los l√≠deres a nivel regional en esta nueva tendencia de la industria, y estamos dando pasos importantes esa direcci√≥n.nuestro equipo tiene a ejecutivos altamente reconocidos en la industria, participando en negocios importante, y coders nativos (sabemos desde assembler, hasta react) con mucha experiencia. funciones del cargo whitestack is a leading company in the cloud computing for telco space, with projects in tier-1/2 operations across latin america (7 countries).we build telco cloud and open networking solutions, leveraging open source projects (such as openstack, kubernetes, open source mano, ceph, prometheus, and many others), in collaboration with global organizations (such as etsi, openinfra foundation, telecom infra project, open compute project), etc. we deliver carrier-class solutions, with commercial support, that are supporting productive networks in several countries. whitestack is looking for a senior integration architect, to lead the integration strategy of our solutions to productive telecom networks. we are looking for an experienced engineer, used to working in complex environments, where different components need to be integrated to productive systems by using standard apis. requirements technical requirements english (for reading/writing technical documentation) advanced linux title: Software Engineer
body: biotechnology is reinventing the future of everything: fuels, fabrics, pharmaceuticals, food, almost every sector of the economy will be touched by it. at teselagen we are building an artificial intelligence-enabled operating system for biotechnology. our platform bridges the gap between biologists who are designing valuable products ‚Äì like vaccines, biologic medicines, and sustainably sourced chemicals ‚Äì lab technicians who are running and optimizing experimental workflows, and bioinformaticians who analyze experimental data and have to recommend new experiments. this modern approach coupled with machine learning has opened the door for a radical transformation of biology and a rapid expansion of potential applications. teselagen was founded by a team of stanford, harvard and u. of california graduates and has raised funding from governments and private investors. job functions as a software engineer, you will be able to share your knowledge and ideas and you will be part of teselagen engineering strategy. this includes developing high-quality code. this role is ideal for individuals looking to develop enterprise technology and scientific software solutions. you will be working with a small but talented team of highly motivated individuals that excel in a fast-paced environment. some specific functions for this role: be part of our development team and contribute to our product's codebase. design and implement components that will translate into new features of our platform. work closely with the engineering and product teams, and with top management, to meet goals. participate in technical meetings with selected partners. qualifications and requirements bs, ms. or phd computer science degree. solid knowledge of programming, data structures, algorithms, and databases. solid software engineering skills for prototype development and the implementation of experimental setups. experience with javascript and full-stack web technologies. fluent in english. desirable skills plus: specific studies in machine learning, data mining, or similar experience. strong plus: knowledge in bioinformatics and/or genomics. benefits a highly impactful and creative role in a company with science and technology at its core. an amazing playground for machine learning applications. a high level of personal responsibility and a great deal of creative freedom. an honest and open feedback culture and individual development opportunities. competitive salary, work flexibility and benefits. traveling to company offices usa, as needed. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. computer provided teselagen spa provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. beverages and snacks teselagen spa offers beverages and snacks for free consumption. remote work policy locally remote only position is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in chile, preferentemente santiago.

title: Data Engineer Technical Leader
body: hi there! if you‚Äôre looking for a high-impact position in an ambitious software house we‚Äôve got a match for you!we‚Äôre a solution company focusing on building cloud-based end-to-end saas platforms. we‚Äôre a squad of outstanding people creating a productive & fun environment. as our teammate, you‚Äôll get the space to develop yourself further & deepen your knowledge of new technologies with exciting projects. our team is growing rapidly and always looks for new tech talents to welcome onboard. are you the one? join the crew and become our next data engineer - technical leader! your main responsibilities for this position will be: implementing big data architecture in azure iot. working with etl processes using nifi, airflow, kafka, spark, databricks, cosmosdb. developing, testing, and implementing spark jobs. ensuring the top level of data quality. understanding business logic and applying it in the processing. participating in the requirement discussion meetings and providing feedback on inconsistencies. this offer will be a perfect match for you if you have: 2+ years of experience working with iot. 5+ years of experience working with python. good knowledge of azure databricks, azure data lake store, pyspark, airflow, flask, pytest, and big data. ability to work: 9:00 - 17:00, and once a week 12:00 - 20:00 (gmt+2 = polish time zone) fluent english (min. b2). conditions job type: full-time jobcontract type: b2b work hours: 8h per day / 40h a weekwork time: 9:00 - 17:00, and once a week 12:00 - 20:00 (as in gmt+2 = polish time zone)contract duration: permanentpossibility of remote work: full remote workbusiness trips involved: 0 fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. computer provided acaisoft provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Front-end Engineer
body: tecla has been working with top u.s. technology and software companies since 2013. we work with modern stacks and on exciting projects and products filled with rewarding challenges.we are a fully remote and distributed company and we are lucky enough to have a diverse and multi-national team with team members in the u.s., mexico, chile, peru, colombia, argentina, brazil, costa rica, and venezuela. job functions we are seeking someone that likes taking designs built by others (usually in figma) and implementing them in html/css. our team builds relatively complex designs so a strong understanding of modern css (such as css grid and flexbox) is imperative.we use a utility class framework (tailwindcss) for the majority of designs, but also incorporate custom sass when needed. we also strive to minimize page rendering times by implementing the design in a way suited to modern browsers (such as avoiding vertical centering on variable height containers).this job will not include design/figma work. your primary focus will be to take mock-ups from the design team and implement html/css that you can commit to our git repository so that the web developers may wire up the functionality. you‚Äôll continuously implement and refine the visual design of the website working with both the ux/design team and engineering team. qualifications and requirements experience with html/css basic to moderate javascript skills are required because they use vue.js with most customer facing pages. knowledge of sass previous experience working with digital products on web/app basic php / ruby / python skills are a plus. conditions remote-first with support for flexible working arrangements. work in a hyper-growth, dynamic and international environment. run in a highly tech-minded environment with top of line tools. transparent company culture with flat hierarchies. lots of responsibility and a real chance to make an impact. paid time off fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

help us make the internet better. if this sounds exciting to you, join the herd!at tucows we care about protecting the open internet, narrowing the digital divide, and supporting fairness and equality. about the role hover, our retail domain registration division, is where the internet‚Äôs ideas find their names online. no gimmicks. no up-sells. just easy domain and email management.we are seeking to hire a keen and self-motivated individual who loves the internet, and loves learning, sharing their knowledge, and applying new technologies to complex problems.you have notable experience developing software and are good at using frameworks like ruby on rails to implement features and ship code regularly. you are also capable of navigating large codebases and uncovering the complexity in existing systems. you are open to giving and receiving feedback, participating in code reviews and design discussions. in addition to the above, you are nimble and able to remain effective when priorities shift. what you‚Äôll be doing: in the first 30 days: gain deep understanding of our existing platforms implement small stories and ensure quality through writing automated tests in the complexity in the first year: own projects or features from conception to release balance the need to ship code quickly with the need to make sound technical decisions. who you are: bachelor degree in computer science, software engineering or equivalent work experience 5+ years professional experience in a software engineering environment experience building application in ruby on rails experience with continuous integration concepts and tools experience delivering highly available and reliable systems good communication skills, both verbal and written experience working in an agile environment who you might be: familiarity with docker & the hashicorp ecosystem exposure to multiple programming languages experience with client side programming with javascript & react comfortable working in a
