title: Back-end Developer
body: flat is an ibuyer for the mexican market, focused on solving the liquidity problem of residential real estate, with a deep tech layer to the traditional home-flipping business, similar to what other players have done in other geographies (opendoor.com, loft.com.br).flat offers clear benefits to both sides of the transaction. for sellers, it makes the process easier and faster, with the possibility of immediately sell the asset. for buyers, it guarantees the conditions of the property, a fair purchase price, and a seamless buying experience. funciones del cargo back-end developer we are seeking a talented and driven back-end engineer with a proven track record / experience from back-end engineering roles in saas, startups, tech platform, etc‚Ä¶ and a deep understanding of python.you will be the back-end engineer working in collaboration with a team of 8 great developers to work on the creation and application of technology to monitor or control the production and delivery of products and services. you'll have a key role in all stages of our tech process, from designing, developing and deploying back-end services focused on improving availability, scalability and performance, to working alongside our engineers in building the most efficient platform for real estate logistics and management. what you will work on collaborate with cto and executive team to align, refine & develop tech strategy the development and rollout out for entire projects build & manage a robust project design, and manage the complete project cycle through design, development and deployment maintain work on existing projects across all business areas to improve the quality of our engineering, and ensure we continue to provide a high quality service to our customers own practices champion the development/adoption of agile processes frameworks (scrums, tdd) why join us at flat.mx? you'll join a world-class, highly skilled team of engineers, with an assigned mentor from day 1. interesting engineering and business challenges, and a culture of openness and welcoming to new ideas we're located in the heart of the city, polanco cdmx, close to amazing restaurants and shops. high career growth both in best engineering practices as well as new technologies. data and result-driven culture we definitely want to talk to you if you have first-hand knowledge of our stack: we mostly work with python 3.4+, django, es6 js, vue.js, and postgresql. you have participated in cross-functional teams or at a high growth start-up. you have collaborated in open source projects. you are excited about real estate technologies you‚Äôll be a good fit for this role if you have 3+ years of software engineering experience. take pride in working on projects to a successful completion involving a wide variety of technologies and systems, sometimes from the ground up. thrive in a collaborative environment involving different stakeholders and subject matter experts. have experience with software development best practices. have strong algorithms and data structures fundamentals. have strong sql fundamentals. have experience with systems design and architecture. perks 15 days off per year (vacation days + personal days) health insurance equipment will be provided by the company on your first day family leave: 4 weeks stock options fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Data Engineer
body: cornershop by uber is an on-demand grocery app that gives you free time, while your groceries and errands are delivered right to your door. we're a fast growing company operating throughout latin america and north america, and since our acquisition by uber, we just keep getting bigger. relaunched under our new brand name. cornershop by uber, we‚Äôre looking to avoca-grow our team. so, if you want to work in an innovative environment, with a startup footprint, people who live for bad jokes and dad humor, you've come to the right place! how many engineers does it take to build an app that simplifies grocery shopping for users? at least 600, because that‚Äôs how many we have in our engineering team, working from different countries in south and north america. the engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, shoppers and stores and solving challenges along the way. data engineer at cornershop, we are looking for a data engineer. we are facing new challenges related to the storage, processing and use of large volumes of data. the data engineer will work on the analysis, design and implementation of big data solutions together with different teams to scale multiple aspects of the organization. these solutions require various technologies and architectures to filter, transform and store data so that engineers, data scientists and business intelligence analysts can use it regardless of the scale of the data. what will you do? work on the analysis, design and implementation of big data solutions, together with different teams to scale multiple aspects of the organization. include various technologies and architectures in these solutions to filter, transform and store data so that engineers, data scientists and business intelligence analysts can use it regardless of its scale. what will you need to succeed in this role? experience with relational and non-relational databases. experience in data loading, using batch and streaming processes. experience with technologies associated with big data solutions (hadoop, spark, cassandra, hbase, hive, samza, faust, kafka, etc). proficiency in python programming language. familiarity with cloud technologies (we occupy aws and google cloud). experience in the creation of data lakes and data warehouses. experience in projects using java or scala. you work proactively, responsibly and creatively. we would love you even more if you... you have experience in creating data lakes and data warehouses. you have experience in projects using java or scala. work proactively, responsibly, and creatively embrace diversity, interculturality and be tolerant you like to constantly learn not only about your work: have a hobby, like doing things and be a positive contribution to title: Full-Stack Developer
body: aictive is developing the latest technology for remote rehabilitation and monitoring, harvesting the power of artificial intelligence and computer vision. we are dealing with the state of the art suite of technologies for solving the following challenges: accurate 3d movement inference from imagery. activity recognition. personalised recommender system based on historical data. web interface for service provision that can handle many users simultaneously. job functions aictive is seeking for a full stack engineer, who will be part of a team responsible for continuous improvement and development for both back and front end. this involves managing api versions, implementing new algorithms, improve web product functionality and developing new servers with specific services, properly handling our current database structure.this full-stack engineer will work as part of a team of six engineers, responsible for maintaining and developing the aictive suite of products. qualifications and requirements you should be proficient in python, js (react) and sql. we work strictly on unix system and you must be proficient and efficient using a terminal. all of aictive services reside in the cloud (aws), we require a candidate who is familiar with the aws product family, including cloudformation, labmda, s3, ec2, load balancer, autoscaling, among others. aictive values autonomous and proactive employees, in this role you will be supervised and supported by our lead engineer. desirable skills we will value greatly if you have experience in c++ and computer vision/deep learning. conditions we are a start up company which is founded, directed and managed by millennials. we are modern in our way of working, leaving all bureaucracy aside and oriented towards our staff wellbeing.we provide two extra weeks of vacations to our employees after the first year, on top of our legal obligation. we also have friday's without meetings and keep our meetings maxed at 45 minutes.we work all over the world (chile, australia and italy), so your working hours are flexible, as long as we are meeting our deadlines then everyone is happy :). fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. vacation over legal aictive gives you paid vacations over the legal minimum. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: BI Engineer Real Time Analytics
body: cornershop by uber is an app that gives you back some of your free time by allowing you to order from local grocery and specialty stores directly to your door. we are a fast-growing company operating in chile, brazil, peru, colombia, mexico, costa rica, the united states and canada, and, since our acquisition by uber, our growth continues to skyrocket, along with our team. so, if you want to work in an innovative environment with a startup culture, people who live for dad jokes, and good humor, you‚Äôre in the right place! how many people are needed to create an application that simplifies the purchase of food from users? at least 600, because that‚Äôs the number of people who are part of our team of engineers, who work in different countries in south and north america. the engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, buyers and stores, and to solving the challenges that arise along the way.cornershop has thousands of scale challenges so you can apply creativity, skill and experience to participate in the creation of optimization tools for different internal processes and propose improvements.our engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, shoppers and stores, and solving challenges along the way. we are looking for our next bi engineer - real time analytics, to be part of creating reports, processing and analyzing data for the company.what will you do:- coordinate with the tech team to obtain the data needed to build each dashboard. - maintain constant communication with our internal clients to understand their information needs and propose solutions.- develop dashboards that facilitate decision making in different areas of the company.- define new kpis to analyze and monitor operational aspects for improvement proposals. what do you need to succeed in this role? advanced management of real-time data visualization tools, preferably grafana. advanced sql skills. ideally with experience working with postgres or amazon redshift. the ability to communicate in english, both written and conversational. we would love you even more if you‚Ä¶ have experience working in real-time analytics. have interacted with the backend (understand how data is defined). are familiar with git. are not afraid to make decisions and lead projects. work proactively, responsibly, and creatively. embrace diversity, multiculturality and are open-minded. like to learn constantly; not only about your job, but you have hobbies, you like to do things outside of work and you bring positive energy to the team. some of the benefits of working with us - additional vacation time- cornershop pop subscription- health, dental, and life insurance- tech platform to enhance your knowledge (o'reilly)- free language lessons- online fitness programs- moving day (two days per year)- marriage or civil union benefits (days off)- paternity/maternity benefits - partnerships with banks- partnership with caja los andes- wellness programsat cornershop, we are focused on promoting an inclusive and accessible work environment, where all people feel valued, respected, and supported. we continue to build a workforce that reflects the diversity of our customers and communities where we live and serve. if you need accommodations to complete the application process, please let our team know directly. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. health coverage cornershop inc. pays or copays health insurance for employees. computer provided cornershop inc. provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. vacation over legal cornershop inc. gives you paid vacations over the legal minimum. remote work policy temporarily remote during covid-19 position is remote only during covid-19-related restrictions.

el futuro (muchos de nuestros practicantes han terminado trabajando full time con nosotros). ¬øcu√°les son las funciones? similares a una pr√°ctica est√°ndar, formar√°s parte de un equipo de javascript: son los dos lenguajes que m√°s usamos, haberlos usado antes suma. beneficios nos esforzamos en crear un ambiente de trabajo y una cultura que potencie a nuestro equipo. tenemos una organizaci√≥n horizontal en la que hay espacio para el aporte de todos al tomar decisiones. fomentamos una cultura abierta para tener feedback constante por parte del equipo y as√≠ mejorar cuando nos equivocamos (somos una start-up, a veces pasa).tenemos patio y parrilla para los asados. celebramos todos los cumplea√±os con empanadas, pizza o lo que se le ocurra a rh. almorzamos juntos, hay noches de juegos y tenemos sillas c√≥modas para todos. adem√°s: el horario es flexible y no te pediremos horas extra, a menos que se est√© acabando el mundo y solo nosotros lo podamos solucionar seguro de title: Back-end Software Engineer
body: cordada is a high-growth fintech company born to help latam small-and-medium businesses (smb, pymes) reach their full potential. it partners with small and medium-sized lenders that have intimate knowledge of specific markets and industries. cordada provides them funding, technological solutions and financial expertise to help them provide their customers the best service.the company has a solid track record and an attractive growth plan to become a major player in the smb financing market in latin america.as a back-end software engineer you will be part of the engineering team of the company, where robustness is fundamental. you will design and build new apps and services.if you are one of those people who like to build solutions or systems where quality is significant, you are what we are looking for! role and responsibilities you will participate in the design and construction of the set of systems that, among others:1.- allow loans to companies through different modalities and alliances.2.- collect, store and make available a wide variety of data sources.3.- monitor insolvency signals.4.- calculate risk scoring of actors and operations.you will have the opportunity to create architectures and services from scratch.you are ideal for the job if with your professional maturity you are able to choose the appropriate technology for each problem, without getting carried away by what is fashionable. requirements you are a computer science engineer (or similar), with a high level of performance and experience working as a back-end software engineer in challenging teams. you like to work with other people who are as or more competent than you because it allows you to learn and achieve better results together.you are comfortable doing your work and studying in english. you could be employed by google or amazon but you prefer to live in chile, or you want to make a significant impact in a company. you care about the work environment and good people skills. you are willing to receive and deliver constructive criticism, and you value horizontality within a company.hard requirements:1.- english: advanced technical level in reading and writing.2.- experience working in team workflows with ci/cd, pull requests, code reviews.3.- programming: advanced experience with python.4.- linux: intermediate user level, including shell experience.5.- databases: modeling, sql, etc, with hands-on experience with some of the popular engines, ideally postgresql.6.- apis: consuming and designing web apis (e.g. rest)7.- cloud: experience implementing cloud-native workloads running in production on some public cloud (google cloud platform (gcp), amazon web services (aws)) or paas, using the corresponding services for e.g. storage, db, cache, horizontal scaling (with containers e.g. docker) optional bonus: experience with the following technologies, paradigms or providers django banking or lending software bpm what we offer a truly shaping tech position with high degrees of responsibility and autonomy plenty of room for personal growth, professional development and high impact a highly talented, dynamic, and multicultural team entrepreneurial experience in a well-financed, high-growth company work with the best technologies available support for contributing to open source software outdoors the premises have outdoor spaces such as parks or terraces. accessible an infrastructure adequate for people with special mobility needs. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. internal talks cordada offers space for internal talks or presentations during working hours. life insurance cordada pays or copays life insurance for employees. paid sick days sick leave is compensated (limits might apply). partially remote you can work from your home some days a week. bicycle parking you can park your bicycle for free inside the premises. health coverage cordada pays or copays health insurance for employees. dental insurance cordada pays or copays dental insurance for employees. computer provided cordada provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. time for side projects cordada allows employees to work in side-projects during work hours. remote work policy temporarily remote during covid-19 position is remote only during covid-19-related restrictions.

title: Data Engineer
body: tecla has been working with top u.s. technology and software companies since 2013. we work with modern stacks and on exciting projects and products filled with rewarding challenges.we are a fully remote and distributed company and we are lucky enough to have a diverse and multi-national team with team members in the u.s., mexico, chile, peru, colombia, argentina, brazil, costa rica, and venezuela. job functions you will work with our data team, embarking on some very large and interesting projects to process data in real-time. this is an exciting opportunity to work with a multi-national team that will allow you to grow and will constantly challenge your knowledge. if you enjoy working as part of a highly collaborative team on ambitious projects, while also being self-sufficient when it comes to execution, this would be the right place for you. qualifications and requirements +4 years of experience working in data engineering. +3 years (the more the better) years working with python and etl experience preferable with airflow. ability to thrive in a fast-paced, rapidly evolving startup environment. excellent verbal, written, and visual communication skills. reliable: you always do what you say you will do. intermediate or advanced spoken english is required for all opportunities. if you can't speak english yet, please keep practicing and apply in the future. desirable skills experience with: aws ecosystem, elasticsearch, ruby/rails, django and heroku experience setting up and managing internal api services conditions 15 days of paid time off per year (increased to 20 days after 2 years working here). 11 holidays per year. a monthly gym bonus. fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Full-Stack Engineer
body: openphone is looking to add to our small and passionate team of engineers who are building a state of an art communication platform over an already existing and popular protocol, telephony.for over a decade, business phones have stagnated in functionality and user experience while the rest of the software ecosystem evolved fast. often these solutions are built around a legacy view of how the phone works or how people communicate.openphone is taking advantage of this unique opportunity to bring the business phone out of the stone age and redefine what it does with a fresh perspective. what we build will set the bar for years to come. we are a well-funded company by investors who invest in companies that are an inevitable part of the future. you can read more about that here.if you‚Äôre looking to work at a disruptive company and build features that directly impact thousands of customers, welcome to openphone. full-stack engineer things you‚Äôll do work hand in hand with the rest of the product team to build features that will delight our customers and help grow the company further. implement pixel perfect designs with intuitive interactions. implement architectural pieces that will make the app reliable, testable and offline-first. implement unit and ui automation tests. tech stack you'll use react frontend utilizing hooks for the composability of functionality. mobx for state management and data binding. typescript as the language. electron for the desktop application. design system with react component library. qualifications and requirements - minimum 5 years of experience.- comfortable with typescript and react.- great understanding of html, css and browsers.- bonus points for having experience with electron.- ability to create pixel perfect, fast, and reusable components. conditions fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. health coverage openphone pays or copays health insurance for employees. computer provided openphone provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

body: teselagen is an enterprise software company headquartered in san francisco, california. at teselagen, we are building the information technology backbone for synthetic biology. our mission is to provide a secure, scalable enterprise platform for modern molecular biology approaches to the production of the next generation of medicines, enzymes and agricultural products. our customers range from large fortune 50 companies to individual academic researchers. descripci√≥n del cargo consulting with managers to determine and refine machine learning objectives. designing machine learning tools. transforming data science prototypes into products and applying appropriate ml algorithms and tools. solving complex problems with multi-layered data sets, as well as optimizing existing machine learning libraries and frameworks. developing ml algorithms to analyze huge volumes of historical data to make predictions. running tests, performing statistical analysis, and interpreting test results. documenting machine learning processes. keeping abreast of developments in machine learning. requerimientos del cargo statistics, artificial intelligence, machine learning, synthetic system, natural language processing, multi-modal representation. fluent in english. beneficios data, data, data. a highly impactful and creative role in a company with data science at its core. an body: ¬°estamos en b√∫squeda de un equipo completo de desarrolladores! an√≠mate y postula con tus amigos, los esperamos!¬øa qu√© nos dedicamos? credit√∫ es una administradora de mutuos hipotecarios endosables, en palabras simples otorga cr√©ditos hipotecarios a clientes individuales que quieren comprar una propiedad y estos son financiados por la venta de mutuos a clientes institucionales (inversionistas).en credit√∫ estamos en plena transformaci√≥n digital, tenemos total respaldo para trabajar √°gilmente sin ning√∫n impedimento.se est√° desarrollando un producto digital con los siguientes lineamientos: concebido de cara a sus usuarios (clientes institucionales e individuales, ejecutivos backoffice). si algo en el proceso se puede automatizar, se hace. el producto es el sistema y el sistema es el producto. cualquier cambio en el proceso implica un cambio en ambos. no es una plataforma de plan de recursos empresariales(erp), sino que el proceso y la operaci√≥n ocurren a trav√©s de la plataforma. nuestra cultura üèÜ en credit√∫ trabajamos con filosof√≠as agile y el framework large-scale scrum. el equipo de pagos es multidisciplinario, eso significa que est√° integrado por profesionales que deben hacerse cargo de todo el ciclo de vida del producto. el equipo de pagos es auto-organizado, eso significa que en lugar de recoger requerimientos desde otros departamentos o desde la gerencia, el backlog del producto se va poblando seg√∫n lo que el equipo reconozca necesario hacer para ir incrementando el producto. ¬øqu√© tendr√°n que hacer? ü§î estamos buscando un equipo de al menos 3 desarrolladores que postulen en conjunto y que tengan al menos 2 a√±os de experiencia trabajando con el ciclo completo del desarrollo software: dise√±o y arquitectura experiencia con alg√∫n framework spa (react, vue, svelte) experiencia con restful api‚Äôs (express, nestjs) testing y aseguramiento de calidad (mocha, jest) infraestructura y cloud computing (aws) ci/cd (integraci√≥n continua y puesta en producci√≥n continua [continuous integration & continuous deployment] (drone, jenkins) no es necesaria experiencia en alg√∫n rubro espec√≠fico, ni contar con alguna carrera que acredite formalmente los conocimientos. estas son las herramientas que estamos usando actualmente üî®‚öô es deseable que las conozcan:¬∑ amazon web services para infraestructura¬∑ vuejs para webapp y frontend¬∑ nestjs para api rest¬∑ python y nodejs para funciones en la nube sobre aws lambda¬∑ gitlab para repositorios de c√≥digo y wiki¬∑ drone.io para integraci√≥n continua¬∑ trello para backlog¬∑ whimsical para prototipado ¬øpor qu√© trabajar en credit√∫? ü§© ¬∑ en credit√∫ no tenemos un √°rea ti, porque somos un equipo de producto. no existe un cto y las decisiones t√©cnicas recaen directo en los equipos.¬∑ tampoco tenemos product managers, sino que la responsabilidad de explotar el producto tambi√©n recae en los equipos.¬∑ los equipos son features team, due√±os de procesos de punta a punta.¬∑ no es necesario obtener autorizaciones para hacer cambios en el c√≥digo. basta con un pull request y revisi√≥n de pares.en credit√∫ los equipos tienen libertad para dise√±ar e implementar solucionesüòéüíªüôå fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. life insurance credit√∫ pays or copays life insurance for employees. computer provided credit√∫ provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Full-Stack Software Developer (TCAD)
body: at synopsys, we‚Äôre at the heart of the innovations that change the way we work and play. self-driving cars. artificial intelligence. the cloud. 5g. the internet of things. these breakthroughs are ushering in the era of smart everything. and we‚Äôre powering it all with the world‚Äôs most advanced technologies for chip design and software security. if you share our passion for innovation, we want to meet you. job description synopsys tcad software solves fundamental, physical partial differential equations, such as diffusion and transport equations, to model the structural properties and electrical behavior of semiconductor devices. this deep physical approach gives tcad simulation predictive accuracy for a broad range of technologies. tcad simulations are used to reduce the costly and time-consuming test wafer runs when developing and characterizing a new semiconductor device or technology.synopsys chile is looking for a full stack software developer with frontend/ui development experiences.you will be part of the team responsible for the design, development, and implementation of the tcad workflow management environment. this will include both desktop and web applications. synopsys‚Äô sentaurus workbench is the industry standard for setting up, editing, and executing tcad workflows as well as analyzing simulation results. together with product development and application engineering teams you will bring our workflow management environment to the next level. qualifications and requirements bs in computer science or related field with 3 ‚Äì 5 years of experience or ms in computer science or related field with 1 ‚Äì 3 years of related experience experience with application programming languages such as python, java, .net, php or ruby experience in frontend/ui development using javascript, vue/react/angular, html5, css3, jquery, and bootstrap experience with cloud platforms and apis/frameworks experience deploying web based microservices into cloud platforms such as aws/ms azure motivated, independent, and self-organized with good analysis and problem-solving skills. excellent teamwork and interpersonal communication skills in multi-site environment. fluent in english (both verbal and written). desirable skills experience with ui frameworks like qt, pyside, or pyqt experience building and maintaining a reusable web components library experience with user-friendly gui designs, usability, and ui prototyping experience working with databases (mongodb, postgresql or sql server) experience working with version control systems experience working with worldwide cross-functional teams knowledge in semiconductor device fabrication and processing conditions inclusion and diversity are important to us. synopsys considers all applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, military veteran status, or disability. library access to a library of physical books. wellness program synopsys chile offers or subsidies mental and/or physical health activities. accessible an infrastructure adequate for people with special mobility needs. relocation offered if you are moving in from another country, synopsys chile helps you with your relocation. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. internal talks synopsys chile offers space for internal talks or presentations during working hours. life insurance synopsys chile pays or copays life insurance for employees. meals provided title: React Engineer / Developer (Remote)
body: carelinx is a startup in the san francisco bay area that is transforming access to affordable, quality in-home care for families with aging or disabled loved ones. as the leading caregiver marketplace with over 500,000 caregivers in the u.s.a, carelinx empowers families to find, hire, manage, and pay caregivers. carelinx also partners with health systems to provide post-acute care solutions that deliver visibility into the home and cloud-based tools for centralized, real-time interventions. as a full-time software developer in our engineering team, you will work in a fast-paced environment to build products and features that will impact people's lives directly. we are looking for a self-driven engineer keen to acquire new development skills, particularly in front-end javascript frameworks like reactjs. work will be fully remote. our engineering team is made up of mostly remote developers with many great engineers from chile, peru, argentina, puerto rico. job functions (fully remote) responsibilities (fully remote) build consumer and enterprise facing features write maintainable code fix bugs be part of an agile team where we respond rapidly to customer feedback, step up regularly to tackle unexpected challenges, and are always shipping understands and follows security policy company guidelines ensures support systems are available and responsive attend daily virtual 30 mins standup via video conference compensation will be very competitive and will be dependent on skillset & relevant experience qualifications and requirements requirements coding experience with javascript frameworks (e.g. reactjs, angular) and css mastery of html good understanding (or willing to learn in days) mvc and mvvm concepts, front-end build processes, tools, and e2e testing attention to pixel level design details to create a beautiful customer experience from design mockups. ability to communicate well in english (verbal and written) has sufficient network bandwidth to do video conference (google meet) able to work within usa timezone (8 hours a day flexible but should overlap at least 2pm - 6pm santiago time) profile of our ideal candidate projects or portfolio demonstrating capabilities in front-end development knowledge or interest in learning the following: reactjs / react native css preprocessors (sass) experience using communication tools like slack, google meet, figma for design handoffs. computer science or related degree preferred love to experience working in a fast-paced startup with lean teams desirable skills keen to learn new skills support learning in the team by actively offering suggestions and ideas to improve adaptable to the team process customer-focus: good understanding of customer pain-points and how features you build are helping the end users. benefits competitive pay fully remote fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. internal talks carelinx inc offers space for internal talks or presentations during working hours. digital library access to digital books or subscriptions. time for side projects carelinx inc allows employees to work in side-projects during work hours. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Full-Stack Developer Python
body: carelinx is a startup in the san francisco bay area that is transforming access to affordable, quality in-home care for families with aging or disabled loved ones. as the leading caregiver marketplace with over 500,000 caregivers in the u.s.a, carelinx empowers families to find, hire, manage, and pay caregivers. carelinx also partners with health systems to provide post-acute care solutions that deliver visibility into the home and cloud-based tools for centralized, real-time interventions.as a full-time software developer in our engineering team, you will work in a fast-paced environment to build products and features that will impact people's lives directly. we are looking for a self-driven full-stack engineer well versed in python/django (with a focus on the back-end).work will be fully remote. our engineering team is made up of mostly remote developers with many great engineers from chile, peru, argentina. job functions responsibilities (fully remote) write maintainable python / django code fix bugs be part of an agile team where we respond rapidly to customer feedback, step up regularly to tackle unexpected challenges, and are always shipping understands and follows security policy company guidelines ensures support systems are available and responsive attend daily virtual 30 mins standup via video conference qualifications and requirements requirements 4 years of coding experience with python / django on websites with real customers ability to communicate well in english (verbal and written) has sufficient network bandwidth to do video conference (google meet) able to work within usa timezone (8 hours a day flexible but should overlap at least 2pm - 6pm santiago time) profile of our ideal candidate projects or portfolio demonstrating capabilities in python/django back-end development knowledge or interest in learning the following: reactjs / react native css preprocessors (sass) experience using communication tools like slack, google meet, zeplin for design handoffs. computer science or related degree preferred desirable skills (optional) experience with javascript frameworks (e.g. reactjs, angular) and css a big plus good understanding (or willing to learn in days) mvc and mvvm concepts, front-end build processes, tools, and e2e testing keen to learn new skills support learning in the team by actively offering suggestions and ideas to improve adaptable to the team process customer-focus: good understanding of customer pain-points and how features you build are helping the end users. benefits compensation will be very competitive and will be dependent on skillset & relevant experience fully remote macbook pro fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. computer provided carelinx inc provides a computer for your work. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Senior Software Engineer
body: clipboard health is a profitable, post series b company that is part of top 100 yc companies we exist to lift as many people up the socioeconomic ladder as possible. the average nursing assistant without a college degree makes $36k a year; the average nursing assistant on clipboard health makes $53k a year and the top 5% make $74k a year. we dramatically improve lives, by letting healthcare professionals turn extra time & ambition into career growth. we have healthcare professionals texting us photos of a car they were finally able to buy, a school & church they‚Äôre building in their native haiti with money they earn here, and more. we‚Äôre a post series b, extremely fast growing startup with classic two-sided network effects. we‚Äôve grown 6x (across all key metrics) in the last 11 months and need your help to keep growing to serve more healthcare professionals, healthcare facilities, and patients. about us what‚Äôs weird about working with us? we care, a lot. our ceo spends substantial time regularly doing customer service, and many of our healthcare professionals and healthcare facility clients have her personal cell phone number. we are globally distributed. just on the engineering team we have folks from: the united states, chile, mongolia, turkey, india, ukraine, indonesia, brazil, columbia‚Ä¶ and that‚Äôs just from folks who‚Äôve joined us so far this year. we take our values seriously: our coo literally has a handmade curiosity initiative and ownership sign on his wall (you‚Äôll see it if you videocall him). we have more engineers than we ‚Äúneed‚Äù on purpose. it makes us fast (many features go from idea to production in 2-4 weeks). it also allows small teams to see a problem, and just go fix it. a team went off and created a new saas product, another team rewrote a core service under a new architecture. one thing we value is that we have no ‚Äútoes‚Äù here to be stepped on. see a problem? go ahead and fix it, you don‚Äôt need permission. qualifications and requirements you‚Äôre good at: scalable/high-performance code on both the frontend and backend, understanding complex technical areas along the way efficient and reusable systems that drive complex web and mobile applications creating software features that are robust, reliable, and user-friendly for both internal teams and our customer base running the full software development lifecycle - problem definition, design, development, testing, demoing, and supporting production use of the features you own balancing immediate business objectives against long-term architectural vision desirable skills extra awesome if you are: a fan of the speed of startups, having worked at one or more (including maybe your own) before familiar with modern open source technologies like: next.js (express.js/react), tailwind ui, flutter, postgresql, mongodb, docker experienced in developing rest apis, mobile & web apps that interface with said apis, on aws (or similar) conditions perks of working with us: do great work that matters, in healthcare, for customers who could really use your help zero commute. work wherever you are, globally (but on or around us pacific time hours) fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. health coverage clipboard health pays or copays health insurance for employees. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: C#/C++ Software Engineer
body: quantconnect is a radically open-source, algorithmic trading technology company building infrastructure to empower engineering and financial analysts around the world. we serve 160,000 engineers who use our platform to write trading algorithms and have traded more than $12b in volume with our open-source algorithmic trading platform. we host a web-based coding environment, to enabling the community to design and code their trading strategies in python or c#. we often have thousands of users simultaneously running intensive data processing.our radically open source project, lean, allows anyone to design algorithmic trading strategies. lean is the c# kernel of quantconnect, processing billions in trading volumes and trillions of data points per day on our cloud cluster. job functions we're looking for brilliant, collaborative engineers to join the lean team, solving complex software engineering problems in the heart of lean. you will not touch a crud application in lean. our lean challenges require a deep understanding of computer science and algorithmic problems. each day we push the barriers of what is technically possible to gain performance improvements and restructure massive models to improve the system design. we've been engineering since 2012 but each day we face more and radical challenges with the rise of crypto trading and forever hungry demands of investors. qualifications and requirements computer science / software engineering degree helps but if you're a savant we don't need a degree. comfort mentally loading large engineering models and understanding data flows, along with where to place the "fix". comfort coding; this role is a hands-on position solving active challenges. comfort with c# or c++. benefits a creative and challenging work environment where you're given a lot of control and discretion to execute the mission of the company. we believe in hiring a small number of brilliant people and then giving them the tools to get the job done. we are a radically open-source company; contributing millions of lines of code each year. we harness and contribute to a dozen repositories around the world. our primary users are other brilliant quants and engineers; working with the community is a joy as you learn from the best in the world. the basics; healthcare, dental, life insurance, 2w paid holiday each year. fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. health coverage quantconnect pays or copays health insurance for employees. computer provided quantconnect provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. beverages and snacks quantconnect offers beverages and snacks for free consumption. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

constantemente. el sueldo liÃÅquido es negociable seguÃÅn experiencia previa y/o grados acadeÃÅmicos. tenemos vacantes para desarrolladores con poca experiencia hasta tech leads. ser√°n un plus para ü§© ¬∑ en credit√∫ no tenemos un √°rea ti, porque somos un equipo de producto. no existe un cto y las decisiones t√©cnicas recaen directo en los equipos.¬∑ tampoco tenemos product managers, sino que la responsabilidad de explotar el producto tambi√©n recae en los equipos.¬∑ los equipos son features team, due√±os de procesos de punta a punta.¬∑ no es necesario obtener autorizaciones para hacer cambios en el c√≥digo. basta con un pull request y revisi√≥n de pares.en credit√∫ los equipos tienen libertad para dise√±ar e implementar solucionesüòéüíªüôå flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. life insurance credit√∫ pays or copays life insurance for employees. computer repairs credit√∫ covers some computer repair expenses. computer provided credit√∫ provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. recreational areas space for games or sports. remote work policy temporarily remote during covid-19 position is remote only during covid-19-related restrictions.

title: Ruby on Rails Senior Software Engineer
body: magmalabs is an ecommerce and software consultancy that builds software solutions for emerging, mid-size, and growing companies using innovative technologies, top talent, and nearshore teams. we are looking for at least 5 senior software engineers to join the engineering department here at magmalabs, with extensive experience building web applications using business-grade technologies using ruby on rails, updating apps with new versions of rails, that enjoy unit testing, who are always looking for optimal performance and have an interest in providing comprehensive and high-quality solutions to customers. senior software engineer (full stack ruby - contractor) to qualify you must possess at least 10 years of experience in custom software development, having delivered plenty of production web and/or mobile applications. because we are one of the most prominent ruby on rails shops in the world, you should have at least five years of experience building and maintaining web applications using ruby on rails, preferably more. as a full stack engineer, you should be able to independently put together solutions from javascript and css on the front-end, to sql and cloud-based deployment configuration pipelines on the backend.the most qualified candidates for this position will possess proven leadership capabilities either in corporate team settings or within the open source community, and you should be able to comfortably demonstrate full confidence in problem analysis, solution design, and the crafting of solutions with well-tested code. we are growing fast and are looking for very experienced senior software engineers with full-stack web development experience to reinforce the technical backbone of our consulting organization.at magmalabs we pride ourselves on a well-nursed culture of teamwork, diversity, and recognition, and for that reason we look to add people who are collaborative, optimistic, and curious. on a day-to-day basis, we expect all our people to be passionate, humble, and hungry for new challenges, possessing a growth mindset and mindful of opportunities for self improvement. requirements you should possess excellent english verbal and written communication skills, and be excited about putting those skills to use with our consulting clients and while mentoring less experienced developers. our growth culture one pillar here at magmalabs is to give back to the community. this is why we organize code retreats, small conferences, meetups, visits to universities, contributions to open source, mentorships, etc. we like to share knowledge outside and inside the company, that's why we organize magmatalks ‚Äîa place to share ideas, tools, and different topics. we support the brightcoders academy, our talent accelerator that provides mentoring and training to the next generation of software engineers. we have a great process to boost team-building with our magmaactivities! (sports, paintball, escape rooms, bowling and more) and we also enjoy partying on special occasions: christmas party, programmer's day, halloween, day of the dead, independence day and more. our benefits (contractor) contract signed with the company in us at least 10 days of vacations per year training plan and continuous learning be part of a company ranked in the top 20% worldwide according to officevibe in employee engagement health and wellness program company retreats and offsite activities #wearemagmawe‚Äôre an incredible team that builds tailored software solutions to help companies execute their vision. altogether, we have helped develop multiple projects and built sites from scratch for more than a hundred projects across different countries. we also love to develop top talent to deliver high-quality products with rigorous execution.ready to join us? apply here! fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Front-end Engineer
body: we are belvo, a financial api platform for latam that enables any company or developer to access and interpret their end-users' financial information. we are turning the rich and diverse latam financial ecosystem into a set of developer-friendly tools and apis.we‚Äôre a highly-technical, passionate and driven team. we have offices in barcelona, mexico city and s√£o paulo and some of us work remotely. we are tackling a very challenging problem: connecting fintech innovators with legacy financial infrastructure.our tech stack: we use javascript, vue.js and sass on the frontend. we mainly use python on our backend. we are developing and leveraging our own design system and component library. we use mixpanel, fullstory, abstract, storybook and other modern tools for product analytics and design collaboration. we follow continuous integration and continuous delivery best practices. your challenge: build applications, ui components and libraries that power the platform that impacts every belvo client, whether they‚Äôre an end-user or a developer. ensuring our ui components and libraries are reliable, scalable, secure, and extensible. implement client-facing interfaces such as sdks, that can be dropped into third-party applications. contribute in the decision making and development phases of client-facing features and their ux/ui. work closely with other product engineers to identify pain-points and architect solutions. you can be part of the gang if: 3+ years of experience building scalable component libraries, design systems, and tools using javascript. experience in fast-paced startup environments. experience in saas or developer-tool type software products deep understanding of modern javascript frameworks (vuejs, react, etc.) a combined passion for great user experience and api design. empathy, a collaborative spirit, and the ability to work effectively with a team. a desire to work closely with developers who depend on your libraries to deliver customer value. you appreciate good documentation, internal and external. attention to detail, especially around performance, reliability, and security. amazing if: fintech past experience relevant programming knowledge in other languages pixel-perfect design will give you bonus points ;) previous experience with vuejs our perks: üöÄ stock options (we are all owners and this is very important to us)üîÜ flexible working hoursüéä paid time off on your birthdayüçª friday happy hours after our weekly team meetingsüôã training budgetüòé team building eventsüôÄ bank holidays swap inside the same month üîã fitness/ wellness stipendsüöÄ yearly offsite fully remote you can work from anywhere in the world. remote work policy fully remote candidates can reside anywhere in the world.

title: Software Engineer
body: biotechnology is reinventing the future of everything: fuels, fabrics, pharmaceuticals, food, almost every sector of the economy will be touched by it. at teselagen we are building an artificial intelligence-enabled operating system for biotechnology. our platform bridges the gap between biologists who are designing valuable products ‚Äì like vaccines, biologic medicines, and sustainably sourced chemicals ‚Äì lab technicians who are running and optimizing experimental workflows, and bioinformaticians who analyze experimental data and have to recommend new experiments. this modern approach coupled with machine learning has opened the door for a radical transformation of biology and a rapid expansion of potential applications. teselagen was founded by a team of stanford, harvard and u. of california graduates and has raised funding from governments and private investors. job functions as a software engineer, you will be at the front of teselagen‚Äôs engineering strategy. this includes developing high quality code. this role is ideal for individuals looking to develop enterprise technology and scientific software solutions. you will be working with a small but talented team of highly motivated individuals that excel in a fast-paced environment. some specific functions for this role: be part of our development team and contribute to our product's codebase. design and implement components that will translate into new features of our platform. work closely with the engineering and product teams, and with top management, to meet goals. participate in technical meetings with selected partners. qualifications and requirements bs, ms. or phd computer science degree. solid knowledge of programming, data structures, algorithms, and databases. solid software engineering skills for prototype development and the implementation of experimental setups. experience with javascript and full-stack web technologies. fluent in english. desirable skills plus: specific studies in machine learning, data mining, or similar experience. strong plus: knowledge in bioinformatics and/or genomics. benefits a highly impactful and creative role in a company with science and technology at its core. an amazing playground for machine learning applications. a high level of personal responsibility and a great deal of creative freedom. an honest and open feedback culture and individual development opportunities. competitive salary, work flexibility and benefits. traveling to company offices usa, as needed. flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. partially remote you can work from your home some days a week. computer provided teselagen spa provides a computer for your work. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. remote work policy locally remote only position is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in santiago.

title: Tech Lead Back-end Engineering
body: we are belvo, a financial api platform for latam that enables any company or developer to access and interpret their end-users' financial information. we are turning the rich and diverse latam financial ecosystem into a set of developer-friendly tools and apis.we‚Äôre a highly-technical, passionate and driven team. we have offices in barcelona, mexico city and s√£o paulo and some of us work remotely. we are tackling a very challenging problem: connecting fintech innovators with legacy financial infrastructure. we strive to go beyond the limits of what is possible today and to do so in an elegant and developer-first way. our tech stack: we're building our platform using modern technologies, putting the focus on reliability and long-term maintainability we primarily use python on the backend. we use battle-tested technologies such as django, and we are heavy users of python's asyncio for some parts of our stack we use javascript, vue.js and sass on the frontend. your challenge: the experience team is building applications and services that expose end-users financial information through a set of public-facing, easy-to-use apis. in addition to that, we take care of the developer experience through documentation, sdks, examples, and other developer-facing tools. lead the architecture, design, and implementation of backend services and apis powering belvo fintech infrastructure. coordinate technical execution with other team members. envision solutions collaboratively and coordinate their execution as a team, addressing technical and coordination issues. mentor other engineers and be a force multiplier. build excellent documentation, sdks, client libraries. continuously improve the ‚Äúdeveloper experience‚Äù of belvo‚Äôs platform. be customer-focused, think as a user of our apis. proactively tackle potential improvements and customer pain points. carefully manage api retro compatibility, document api changes, and implement deprecation plans. implement automated quality assurance and monitoring modules you can be part of the gang if: 6+ years of experience as a software engineer, of which 2+ as a tech lead strong experience designing and developing restful apis strong professional experience with python and django. willingness to solve challenging problems amazing if: fintech and saas past experience relevant programming knowledge in other languages such as javascript, java, php, ruby or go. experience building large-scale platforms with global reach. our perks: üöÄ stock options (we are all owners and this is very important to title: Back-end Engineer (Python/aPIs)
body: a little bit about us:we are belvo, a financial api platform for latam that enables any company or developer to access and interpret their end-users' financial information. we are turning the rich and diverse latam financial ecosystem into a set of developer-friendly tools and apis.we‚Äôre a highly-technical, passionate and driven team. we have offices in barcelona, mexico city and s√£o paulo and some of us work remotely. we are tackling a very challenging problem: connecting fintech innovators with legacy financial infrastructure. we strive to go beyond the limits of what is possible today and to do so in an elegant and developer-first way. our tech stack: we're building our platform using modern technologies, putting the focus on reliability and long-term maintainability we primarily use python on the backend. we use battle-tested technologies such as django, and we are heavy users of python's asyncio for some parts of our stack we use javascript, vue.js and sass on the frontend. your challenge: the experience team is building applications and services that expose end-users' financial information through a set of public-facing, easy to use apis. in addition to that, we take care of the developer experience through documentation, sdks, examples and other developer-facing tools. develop our client-facing apis, especially as we add data sources, endpoints or a new product altogether. build excellent documentation, sdks, client libraries. continuously improve the "developer experience" of belvo's platform. be customer-focused, think as a user of our apis. proactively tackle potential improvements and customer pain points. carefully manage api retro compatibility, document api changes and implement deprecation plans. implement automated quality assurance and monitoring modules. you can be part of the gang if: degree in computer science or equivalent working experience strong experience designing and developing restful apis working experience programming in python. django is a plus. track record of producing a-grade documentation for public consumption detail-oriented developer, coding so others can read and work with your code willingness to solve challenging problems amazing if: fintech and saas past experience experience with techniques and tools for crawling, extracting and processing data relevant programming knowledge in other languages such as javascript, java, php, ruby or go. experience building large-scale platforms with global reach. our perks: we give the option to our employees to work fully remote or move to barcelona to our hq, where you can enjoy all of our perks, like the short beach distance or a pet-friendly office.üèÑ 1.8km from the beachüöÄ stock options (we are all owners and this is very title: Desarrollador/a Ruby on Rails
body: en lexgo llevamos m√°s de 3 a√±os ayudando a cientos de empresas a resolver sus necesidades legales usando tecnolog√≠a. ayudamos a empresas nacionales e internacionales desde redactar sus contratos comerciales hasta captar financiamiento por parte de inversionistas. estamos ubicados en santiago de chile, desde donde trabajamos para disrumpir el mercado de los servicios legales en todo el mundo.somos una startup legaltech con gente proactiva, con harta experiencia en tecnolog√≠a y mucha motivaci√≥n, buscando m√°s gente que quiera generar un cambio en esta industria. nos importa el cumplimiento de objetivos m√°s que los horarios, y a pesar de que nos gusta trabajar en persona, no tenemos problemas estar remoto, desde cualquier lugar de chile o el mundo. funciones del cargo en una primera instancia, ser√°s responsable de la mantenci√≥n y soporte de las soluciones de software desarrolladas por nuestro equipo, las cuales se encuentran en uso por cientos de clientes.una vez comprendas e interiorices nuestra forma de trabajo y las exigencias de calidad asociadas a √©sta, pasar√°s a desarrollar en una de las tres √°reas de lexgo seg√∫n tus habilidades y experiencia: producto de cara al cliente: creaci√≥n de contratos, firma electr√≥nica y asesor√≠a legal producto interno: operaciones, legal y ventas apoyadas en tecnolog√≠a e integraciones productos empresariales: soluciones legales tecnol√≥gicas a medida para clientes trabajar√°s de manera independiente en tareas que discutiremos, estimaremos y priorizaremos en conjunto en un tablero tipo kanban de manera semanal o bisemanal. tu c√≥digo ser√° revisado por medio de pull requests en github y se espera de ti que revises diariamente c√≥digo de otros. qu√© es lo que buscamos? proactividad. queremos que pienses y opines, no solo que ejecutes tareas habilidades comunicativas para el trabajo tanto con equipo interno como desarrolladores al menos 2 a√±os de experiencia trabajando con ruby on rails o frameworks web similares se valora que tengas un sentido de est√©tica de interfaces y experiencia de usuario experiencia colaborando con git, haciendo pull requests y code review cultura de testing con rspec y capybara o herramientas equivalentes experiencia con desarrollo guiado por pruebas o comportamiento (tdd o bdd) trabajo √°gil tipo kanban, estimando y ejecutando tarjetas de manera independiente uso de html, css & javascript de forma modular, para evitar c√≥digo repetitivo creaci√≥n y consumo de apis tipo http (apis graphql son un plus) opcionales saber de cloud computing (como aws) y herramientas como kubernetes o elasticsearch despliegue e integraci√≥n continua (cd y ci, respectivamente) experiencia con react u otros frameworks de frontend basados en componentes experiencia con wordpress, divi y/o dise√±o de landing pages para marketing ¬øqu√© es lo que obtendr√°s? posibilidad de trabajo 100% remoto, ojal√° dentro de chile para vernos de vez en cuando trabajo orientado al cumplimiento de objetivos horario laboral flexible, siempre y cu√°ndo te sea posible acomodar reuniones semanales si te acomoda una oficina, puedes trabajar con nosotros en providencia tambi√©n posibilidad de hacer home office las veces que creas necesario (si no trabajas 100% remoto) un ambiente colaborativo de trabajo donde tu aporte es altamente valorado flexible hours flexible schedule and freedom for attending family needs or personal errands. informal dress code no dress code is enforced. vacation over legal lexgo gives you paid vacations over the legal minimum. remote work policy locally remote only position is 100% remote, but candidates must reside in chile.
